entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS AROUND 70

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
